He has a high mentality and can calculate these figures mentally.

sentences.en: He has many years'experience of the criminal mentality.

sentences.en: He was a good businessman, but he had the mentality of a consumerist.

sentences.en: I can’t understand the mentality of the people who are behind this kind of violence.
sentences.cn: 我不能理解这种暴力行为的幕后指使者是什么心态。

sentences.en: I cannot understand the mentality of football hooligans.

sentences.en: Police officers had a siege mentality that isolated them from the people they served.
sentences.cn: 警察们有一种受围心态，这使得他们脱离了所服务的群众。

sentences.en: Running a business requires a very different mentality from being a salaried employee.

sentences.en: The letter threw light on the mentality of his former friend.
sentences.cn: 这封信透露了他先前的朋友的心理状态.

sentences.en: The majority have a built-in Luddite mentality; they are resistant to change.
sentences.cn: 大部分人天生有种反对技术进步的心理。他们抗拒变革。

sentences.en: The mentality of these country people is despicable.
sentences.cn: 这里人们的心理状态真是太差了.

sentences.en: Therefore, the bottom course of stability is essential mentality.
sentences.cn: 因此, 筑底过程中稳定心态至关重要.

sentences.en: This predisposition may bespeak a different mentality.

sentences.en: Well, why can't we impute the same sinister mentality to the deceased?

sentences.en: What kind of profit mentality was this - taking cars willy - nilly out of production?
sentences.cn: 不管三七二十一就取消一批车子的生产--这算是什么盈利思想 呢 ?

sentences.en: What the author of primitive mentality means by " participation " is familiar enough.
